text: Tom Keir Blyth (born 2 February 1995) is an English actor. He is known for his role as a young Coriolanus Snow in The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes (2023). He also plays the main role in the MGM+ series Billy the Kid (2022â€“). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Birmingham
title: Tom Blyth
